archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0835
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Fraud Manager I want tight, auditable controls on who can send data outside of our business to protect both our customers' data and Vodafone's intellectual property

properties.value: System should limit sending notifications to unknown email addresses or limit data extract from the system. All actions like this should be role based.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
